# Output generated by @ua_chatgpt_bot

Ваше питання: Write an Essay ''About people's dependence on computers.''
Answer the questions: ''What things will they be used in future for? Is it good that we depend on computers?''
Write an essay of no more than 100 words. Use B1 english level

Відповідь: People's dependence on computers has grown rapidly in recent years. Computers are used for almost everything from our work, entertainment, and education. In the future computers will be used for more advanced tasks. We will have artificial intelligence to converse with and machines for more accurate medical diagnoses. It is good that we depend on computers because they can help us do things more efficiently and quickly, however, too much reliance on computers can lead to issues such as technological unemployment. Therefore, it is important to use computers responsibly and in moderation.
